summary: Completed frontend testing of enhanced Approval Workflow Guide documentation page. All new sections (Creator workflow, Manager workflow, Notifications) are present and working correctly. The page required a frontend rebuild to pick up the changes. Found 14 DocScreenshot placeholders, Interactive Tutorial component, role-specific alert boxes, and NotificationCard components.
passed_tests: Demo admin login successful with credentials demo-admin@contentry.com / DemoAdmin!123
Approval Workflow Guide at /contentry/documentation/approval loads correctly
Page title 'Content Approval Workflow Guide' displayed

'On This Page' navigation shows all 7 sections: Overview, Why Use Approval Workflows?, Workflow Stages, Creator: Creating & Submitting Posts, Manager: Reviewing & Approving Posts, Notifications & Alerts, Best Practices
Interactive Tutorial component present with 'Interactive Tutorial Available' text
'Start Tutorial' button is visible and clickable
'Creator: Creating & Submitting Posts' section heading found
Creator role alert box found: 'This section is for users with the Creator role'
'Manager: Reviewing & Approving Posts' section heading found
Manager role alert box found: 'This section is for users with the Manager or Admin role'
NotificationCard 'New Content Pending Review' found (Manager notification)
14 DocScreenshot placeholders found with 'Capture Screenshot' buttons
5 Creator role badges found in WorkflowStep components
2 Manager role badges found in WorkflowStep components
context_for_next_testing_agent: The Approval Workflow Guide page has been enhanced with detailed Creator and Manager workflow sections. The page contains 14 DocScreenshot placeholders that show 'Screenshot not yet captured' with 'Capture Screenshot' buttons - these are expected as screenshots need to be captured separately. The frontend needed a rebuild (yarn build) and restart to pick up the changes from the source file. All sections are navigable via the 'On This Page' sidebar. NotificationCard components display example notifications for both Creator (approved/rejected) and Manager (new submissions, queue summary) roles.
